|brand = TP-LINK |model = AD7200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (US) v1.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 25, 2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_AD7200_(Talon) |wlclass = AD7200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7AD7200, PPD-QCA9008-SBD1 |icid = 8853A-AD7200, 4104A-QCA9008SBD1 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8064; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7-A |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, M.2 Card slot, |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_M.2 = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MU-MIMO, WiGig |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier;Skyworks;SKY85405;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ad
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXX, TP-LINK_XXXX_5G, TP-LINK_XXXX_60G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/29/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = 350 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833704301 |asin = B01FRP2758 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3mod = Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1 |rad3modif = M.2 (1216) |rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9500; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad3txchains = 1 |rad3rxchains = 1 |rad3sstreams = 1 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11ad |rad3ad = 4620 |rad3freq = 60
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_AD7200.html Product page] (marked EoL on Product page)
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7/AD7200 TE7AD7200], Contains FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCA9008-SBD1 PPD-QCA9008-SBD1] {{see also|Qualcomm|TP-LINK}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/review-tp-link-talon-ad7200-80211ad-router-review-blazing-ahead-60ghz ''TP-LINK Talon AD7200 Router'' on '''HardwareZone'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33009-tp-link-talon-ad7200-multi-band-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Talon AD7200 Multi-Band Wi-Fi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz dual-core Internet Processor ::RAM: 512 MB (2x DDR3), Flash: 256 MB :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*60GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9500 1x1 (AD4600) ::- [[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1]] module :*Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (4x GbE) *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32871-tp-link-archer-c2600-ac-2600-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Archer C2600 AC 2600 Wireless Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz dual-core Internet Processor ::RAM: 512 MB (2x DDR3), Flash: 32 MB (SPI) :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (4x GbE)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_ad7200_talon |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq806x |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a15_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Talon-AD7200-1.jpg| File:Talon-AD7200-2.jpg| File:Talon-AD7200-3.jpg| File:Talon-AD7200-4.jpg| File:Talon-AD7200-5.jpg| File:Talon-AD7200-6.jpg| File:Talon-AD7200-7.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==Notes== *[https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2016/01/05/qualcomm-80211ad-products-lead-way-multi-band-wi-fi-ecosystem ''Qualcomm 802.11ad Products for Multi-band Wi-Fi Ecosystem'' on '''Qualcomm'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32915-tp-link-ces-2016-announcements ''TP-LINK CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*TP-LINK AD7200 (Talon) - ''AD7200 Multi-band Wi-Fi Router'' (802.11ac/ad) ::4620Mbps (60GHz) / 1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz) (AC2600) ::AC2600 4x4 [[Qualcomm]] MU-MIMO with single-stream 802.11ad radio ::[[Qualcomm]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, 2x USB 3.0 ports, 8x ext. antennas :*[[TP-LINK Archer C5400 v1.x]] - ''AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C5400 FCC] ::2x 2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM ::[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio :*[[TP-LINK Archer C3150]] - ''AC3100 Wireless Dual-Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150 FCC] ::2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM ::[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio :*[[TP-LINK SR20]] - ''AC1900 Smart Home Router with Touchscreen'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), ZigBee and Z-Wave ::@1GHz dual-core CPU, USB 2.0/3.0 ports, SD Card slot, 4.3" display *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2015/32593-tp-link-debuts-ac-router-duo ''TP-LINK Debuts AC Router Duo - CES 2015'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''''] :*[[TP-LINK Archer C3200]] - ''AC3200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C3200 FCC] ::2x 1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), [[Broadcom]]'s XStream :*[[TP-LINK Archer C2600 v1.x|TP-LINK Archer C2600]] - ''AC2600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C2600 FCC] ::1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 AC [[Qualcomm]] QCA9980
==See also== *[[List of 802.11ad Hardware]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]]
